title: Sulfur-doped activated carbon for the efficient degradation of tetracycline with persulfate: Insight into the effect of pore structure on catalytic performance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11470-11481
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08958D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yaoping Guo, Yaxiong Huang, Yifan Li, Yan Luo, Keng Xuan, Yadan Guo, Hao Jiang, Rui Fang
Sulfur-doped activated carbon has proved to be a promising metal-free catalyst for persulfate (PDS) catalytic activation for the oxidation of aqueous refractory organics.
